entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 20 PERCENT

SNOW SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF SLEET IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW AND SLEET ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS AND FREEZING RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
